cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2374, Peace and Tolerance in Palestinian Education Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 60 (Monday, April 5, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SHERMAN:
H.R. 2374.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H1714]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

title: Peace and Tolerance in Palestinian Education Act
